1418-1819: EVENTNAME237000 for Bulgaria

Back to Index

237000. EVENTNAME237000

Bulgaria — Not random

Conditions

  • The following must not occur:
    • Bulgaria is a vassal of Ottoman Empire
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • State religion is sunni
    • State religion is shia

Will happen within 0 days of December 31, 1418
Checked again every 0 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after December 31, 1819)

Description

EVENTHIST237000

Actions

A. ACTIONNAME237000A

  • Change religion to orthodox
  • +50 relations with Moscow
  • +50 relations with Russia
  • +50 relations with Wallachia
  • +50 relations with Moldavia
  • +50 relations with Serbia
  • -200 relations with Ottoman Empire
